post.excerpt: This is a user-defined post excerpt. It should be displayed in place of the post content in archive-index pages. It can be longer than the automatically generated excerpts, and can have HTML tags.
post.content: This is the post content. It should be displayed in place of the user-defined excerpt in single-page views.
post.title: Template: Excerpt (Defined)

previous.excerpt: This content is before the more tag. Right after this sentence should be a “continue reading” button of some sort on list pages of themes that show full content.
